descriptionHtml:
Giants sing the trololololol song. 

Here is a video i made: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X8CodNiMV8c

And here is a video that Arsenalrobert made of my mod: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=v4aNHg6RRqI


--Installation--
Just put the data folder in your skyrim folder and merge it with your original data folder.

--Uninstallation--
to remove the texture navigate to data/textures/actors and delete the giant folder
to remove the sound navigate to data/sound/npc and delete the giant folder
author: thomas grothe

files.name: Giant Troll
